響.definition: echo; sound; noise; to make a sound; to sound; to ring; loud; classifier for noises

響動.definition: sound coming from sth (typically sth not immediately visible); also pr. [xiang3 dong5]

響叮噹.definition: to tinkle; to jingle; to clank

響應.definition: to respond to; answer; CL:個|个[ge4]

響應號召.definition: to answer a call to action

響水.definition: Xiangshui county in Yancheng 鹽城|盐城[Yan2 cheng2], Jiangsu

響水縣.definition: Xiangshui county in Yancheng 鹽城|盐城[Yan2 cheng2], Jiangsu

響箭.definition: whistling arrow (used in ancient times as a signal)

響起.definition: (of a sound) to come forth; (of a sound source) to ring out; to sound; to go off

響雷.definition: to be thundering; thunder clap; CL:個|个[ge4]

響頭.definition: to bump one's head; to kowtow with head-banging on the ground
